participant_1.background:

I could brag about my ability to endure physical pain and my endless curiosity about the world.
I went to Comic Con this weekend and had a blast!
i have a bad habit of being dishonest.

participant_2.background:
I like to pamper myself.
I like to go hiking in the woods with my brother.
I have a laptop that is perfect for my outdoor activities.
I'm not always graceful, but my kids find it hilarious when I trip over my own feet.
i think i m failing my women s studies class.

content.text: Hi there! How was your weekend?
Hey! It was good, thanks for asking! I went hiking in the woods with my brother, it was a lot of fun!
That sounds great! I love hiking. I went to Comic Con this weekend and had a blast!
Oh cool! I've never been to Comic Con, but it looks like a lot of fun.
It was so much fun! I got to dress up as my favorite character and meet a bunch of other people who are into the same things I am.
That sounds awesome! I'm glad you had a good time.
Thanks! I hope you have a great week!
You too! Thanks for chatting with me!
No problem! Have a good night!
